data.partBlankContent: Gary speaks five languages. He lea____ German a__ English a_ a ch___. He stu____ French i_ school f__ four ye___. At unive_____, h_ went t_ Spain a__ studied Spanish. Now, he li___ in China and i_ learning Mandarin. He loves learning languages.
data.fullContent: Gary speaks five languages. He learned German and English as a child. He studied French in school for four years. At university, he went to Spain and studied Spanish. Now, he lives in China and is learning Mandarin. He loves learning languages.
data.answer: 加里会说五种语言。他小时候学过德语和英语。他在学校学了四年法语。在大学里，他去西班牙学习西班牙语。现在，他住在中国，正在学习普通话。他喜欢学习语言。
